metadata.title: CVE-2019-16165 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
GNU cflow through 1.6 has a use-after-free in the reference function inparser.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16165` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cflow - 1:1.7-2
cflow-l10n - 1:1.7-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cflow package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.7-2').
